description: Software architecture and design services for Industry Canada.
duration_in_months: Well from here, there can be one of two google clockwise alternatives....
full_summary: ### Government Tender Announcement #### Application SW Architect #### PW-22-01010701 *Reference Number: PW-22-01010701* The Government of Canada, represented by Industry Canada, invites bids for the Application SW Architect contract (PW-22-01010701). This procurement is open to all interested parties and is subject to the provisions of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). #### Key Details * **Tender Status**: This tender has expired * **Tender Closing Date:** Friday, 2022-11-03 14:00:00 * **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified * **Expected Contract End Date:** Not Specified * **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR) * **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR) * **Trade Agreements:** The tender is subject to the following trade agreements: + Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) + Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement + Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) + Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) + Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) + Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) + Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) + Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) + General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) + Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) + Atlantic Procurement Agreement + World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) + Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement #### Tender Description The scope of work for this contract includes providing Application SW Architect services. The estimated quantity of commodities required is approximately 3.75M. The duration of the contract is from 2022-11-14 to 2023-11-13, with a delivery timeframe of 2022-10-01 to 2022-11-14. Please refer to the attached document for additional requirements and conditions. #### Contacts * Name: Heidi Gagne * Email: heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca * Phone: +1-343-542-9135 * Address: 235 Queen St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5 #### Attachments * The tender package can be accessed through the following link: https://
